body: Juan Arellano in Globalizado [es] reports on reactions to a 2005 cable released by Wikileaks, which reveals that "Fernando Rospigliosi, former Minister of Interior in the administration of Alejandro Toledo, asked for the collaboration of the United States Embassy to carry out a campaign against Ollanta Humala."
original_body: Juan Arellano in Globalizado [es] reports on reactions to a 2005 cable released by Wikileaks, which reveals that "Fernando Rospigliosi, former Minister of Interior in the administration of Alejandro Toledo, asked for the collaboration of the United States Embassy to carry out a campaign against Ollanta Humala."
title: Peru: Wikileaks Cable Stirs Electoral Campaign
